pages.text: Pots are a decorative storage option. Fired Pots hold 8 stacks of a single item, while the Glazed Pots hold 16 stacks. The stored item is represented on the lip of the pot. Pots also keep their inventory when broken.
The Unfired Pot is crafted in preparation for the Fired Pot. Therefore, there is no storage associated with the Unfired Pot.
Fired and Glazed Pots need heat from the smelter to harden their clay and provide storage.
